title: Integration Tests
description:
Integration Test Suite for Critical Workflows and API Endpoints

Develop comprehensive integration tests that verify the correct interaction between different components, services, and API endpoints across critical user workflows.

Requirements:
- Identify and document all critical user workflows (e.g., authentication, data creation/modification, checkout process)
- Create integration tests for each major API endpoint covering:
  - Successful request/response cycles
  - Error handling and validation
  - Authentication/authorization checks
  - Data persistence verification
- Test end-to-end workflows that span multiple API calls or services
- Include database state verification before and after operations
- Test edge cases such as:
  - Concurrent requests
  - Invalid or malformed data
  - Missing or expired authentication tokens
  - Rate limiting behavior
- Set up test database/environment isolation to prevent interference
- Ensure tests are idempotent and can run in any order
- Add CI/CD integration to run tests automatically on pull requests
- Achieve minimum 80% coverage of critical paths
- Document test scenarios and expected outcomes
